Package org.reldb.wrapd.tuples

Class Tuple

java.lang.Object
org.reldb.wrapd.tuples.Tuple
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public abstract class Tuple
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
The base class for all tuples. Derived classes are usually auto-generated by TupleTypeGenerator.

    • insert

      public java.util.List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure> insert​(Database database, java.sql.Connection connection, java.lang.String tableName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Insert this Tuple.
      Parameters:
      database - Database.
      connection - Connection to database, typically obtained via a Transaction.
      tableName - Table name.
      Returns:
      List of failures to retrieve one or more fields. Empty if all fields retrieved.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Failure.

    • update

      public org.reldb.toolbox.types.Pair<java.util.List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure>,​java.util.List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure>> update​(Database database, java.sql.Connection connection, java.lang.String tableName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Update this tuple.
      Parameters:
      database - Database.
      connection - Connection to database, typically obtained via a Transaction.
      tableName - Table name.
      Returns:
      Return a pair of List<FieldGetFailure> where the left item is the new field get failures, and the right item is the original (backup) field get failures. Both lists in the Pair are empty if successful.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Failure.

    • update

      public org.reldb.toolbox.types.Pair<java.util.List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure>,​java.util.List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure>> update​(Database database, java.lang.String tableName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Update this tuple.
      Parameters:
      database - Database.
      tableName - Table name.
      Returns:
      Return a pair of List<FieldGetFailure> where the left item is the new field get failures, and the right item is the original (backup) field get failures. Both lists in the Pair are empty if successful.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Failure.
